magic_missile.name: Magic Missile
magic_missile.description: A bolt of pure arcane energy strikes your target.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Hurls a ball of roaring flame at the target.
fireball.hit_message: A fireball engulfs {target_name}, dealing {value} fire damage!

ice_shard.name: Ice Shard
ice_shard.description: Launches a jagged shard of ice at the target.
ice_shard.hit_message: {caster_name}'s ice shard pierces {target_name}, dealing {value} cold damage!

bone_shard.name: Bone Shard
bone_shard.description: Launches a sharp fragment of bone at the target.
bone_shard.hit_message: A bone shard strikes {target_name} for {value} piercing damage!

poison_cloud.name: Poison Cloud
poison_cloud.description: Conjures a noxious cloud that poisons the target.
poison_cloud.hit_message: {target_name} is enveloped by the poison cloud!

immolate.name: Immolate
immolate.description: Engulfs the target in magical flames that burn over time.

ember_bolt.name: Ember Bolt
ember_bolt.description: A small bolt of magical fire.
ember_bolt.hit_message: An ember strikes {target_name} for {value} fire damage!
